channel.title: hugo on My Blog
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on My Blog

item.title: Setup your website using 'clean white' theme
item.description: Install brew install hugo hugo version hugo new site myhugowebsite Download theme cd myhugowebsite git init cd themes git clone https://github.com/hopeworker/hugo-theme-cleanwhite.git cp -r hugo-theme-cleanwhite/exampleSite/** ../ Add post hugo new post/my-first-post.md Launch hugo server -D Build static pages hugo -D Reference https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ https://themes.gohugo.io/ https://themes.gohugo.io/themes/hugo-theme-cleanwhite/ https://themes.gohugo.io/themes/hugo-theme-cleanwhite/#comment-systems
